Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
bitchy \bitchy\ adj. marked by or arising from malice. [slang]
Syn: catty, cattish. [WordNet 1.5]
bitchy adj : marked by or arising from malice; "a catty remark" [syn: {catty}, {cattish}] [also: {bitchiest}, {bitchier}]
